you_marked_missed: You marked today as medicine not taken ❌
guide_step1: When you first start using the mobile app (HypoThyroManage), you are expected to watch all videos and follow the recommendations. You can access these videos via the “Videos and Education” button on the home screen.
guide_step2: You should report your daily thyroid medication intake via the “Daily Medicine Tracker” on the home screen.
guide_step3: Once a week, enter the symptoms you experienced into the “Weekly Report” section in “Reports.”
guide_step4: You are advised to rewatch videos related to your symptoms. You can find related information in the “Symptom Videos” section.
guide_step5: You can ask questions anytime via the “Ask a Health Professional” section.
guide_step6: You can view your weekly symptom and medicine reports collectively from the “Reports” section on the home screen.

steps.title: Watch Educational Videos
steps.desc: You are expected to watch all videos and follow the recommendations on first use. You can access them via the “Videos and Education” button.

steps.title: Report Medicine Intake
steps.desc: You should report your daily thyroid medicine intake via the “Daily Medicine Tracker” section.

steps.title: Enter Symptom Report
steps.desc: Enter your symptoms once a week via “Reports > Weekly Report”.

steps.title: Rewatch Symptom Videos
steps.desc: It is recommended to rewatch videos related to your symptoms.

steps.title: Ask Questions
steps.desc: You can ask questions anytime through the “Ask a Health Professional” section.

steps.title: General Overview
steps.desc: You can view all your reports collectively in the “Reports” section.
